EmailTemplate.subject: Assure Application Performance with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
At Turbonomic, our mission is to deliver a software platform that continuously and automatically maintains the health of workloads, at scale, wherever they're deployed.
Based on your profile, we think you are an excellent fit to see a demo of our software.
You can sign up here <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>Â and we'll schedule a call.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
